attributes.action: allow christian unions to control leadership members
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Christian unions and for that matter any other faith groups should be allowed to prevent people not from their faith group entering into leadership of them.  For example it should be allowed to prevent an atheist from entering into leadership of a Christian union.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
